channel.title: I'm Ciro!
channel.description: 我歌月徘徊，我舞影零乱

item.title: Hello!
item.description:
Hello, everyone. I’m Ciro, living in Nanjing. I’m a student in NJUT. Glad to see you!
I set up the blog to record my daily life, expre
item.content:encoded:
Hello, everyone. I’m Ciro, living in Nanjing. I’m a student in NJUT. Glad to see you!
I set up the blog to record my daily life, express my thoughts and feelings, and urge myself to summarize what I have learned.
I sincerely hope to get your message on the message board.
